channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Emptoris Sourcing
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Emptoris Sourcing

item.title: CVE-2016-6114|2024-09-16T16:43:44.639Z -- ibm -- emptoris%20sourcing
item.description: IBM Emptoris Sourcing 9.5.x through 10.1.x is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 118352.

item.title: CVE-2016-8947|2024-09-16T17:42:36.557Z -- ibm -- emptoris%20sourcing
item.description: IBM Emptoris Sourcing 9.5.x through 10.1.x could allow a remote attacker to conduct phishing attacks, using an open redirect attack. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to spoof the URL displayed to redirect a user to a malicious Web site that would appear to be trusted. This could allow the attacker to obtain highly sensitive information or conduct further attacks against the victim. IBM X-Force ID: 118834

item.title: CVE-2020-4896|2024-09-16T16:18:21.575Z -- ibm -- emptoris%20sourcing
item.description: IBM Emptoris Sourcing 10.1.0, 10.1.1, and 10.1.3 is vulnerable to web cache poisoning, caused by improper input validation by modifying HTTP request headers. IBM X-Force ID: 190987.
